attributes.action: Urgent Call to Action: Parliamentary Petition to Slash Driving Test Wait Times
attributes.additional_details: We're urging the government to address long waiting times and system inefficiencies in driving test appointments. Swift action is essential to improve access to employment opportunities and reduce delays for aspiring drivers, contributing to a more efficient and equitable society.
attributes.background:
Demand Reform
Long Waiting Times: Increase test slots
Booking System Glitches: Enhance online system
Last-Minute Cancellations: Review policies
Communication Gaps: Ensure timely updates
Resource Investment: Allocate necessary funds
Allow driving school cars in LTNs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644485
